name: Huddle
short_description: Huddle provides cloud based online collaboration and document sharing solutions for users and businesses.
long_description:
Huddle provides cloud based online collaboration and document sharing solutions for users and businesses. Using a Software as a Service (SaaS) service model, Huddle combines Enterprise Content Management (ECM) and social software allowing companies and communities to collaborate flexibly. The key functionality that the Huddle system provides is:
  • A web-based workspace area where teams of individuals can access their content
  • Hierarchical file storage with clean document preview
  • Document workflow such as reviews, comments and version history
  • Permissions models around folders so access can be restricted to specific teams
  • Creation and tracking of tasks assigned to members of the team, with automatic reminders
  • Instant note taking facility with mark-down formatting
  • Dashboard feature to provide a quick overview of activity within the team
